name: Final Flight (Frustrated-Programmer)
description:
A game my family made for the Epic Games MEGA JAM 2019, we were several days late. Decided to upload the game anyways.

Controls is listed in game, via the controls tab. This game also supports a controller.

This game does not support saving your progress. I tried learning how, but we were pressed for time so I never added it. Perhaps if I get enough views/likes I'll add an update. We had a LOT of ideas.

Note: if you select a level and click play and after a few seconds it goes back to the Main Menu, this is a bug that I've spent hours trying to find. It randomly appears unfrequently. So just click play again and chances are the game will successfully load.

There is a single cheat added, but I highly don't suggest using it. If you insist on finding out what the cheat is: The character O gives you 1000 coins.
